text: 5:2 Jon 10:11-13; 21:15-17; Aposel 20:28; 1 Korin 9:17; Taitus 1:7; 1:11; Filemon 1:14; 1 Pita 3:1-6Ia Godɨn gumazamiziba deravɨra men gan. Me sipsipbar mɨn ian agharimɨn iti. Tav ia ingangarir kam damusɨ ia abɨntɨma, ia ingaran markɨ. Ia ingangarir kam damuasa God ifonge. Kamaghɨn, ia ifueghɨva ingangarir kam damu. Ia ivezim baghɨva akongɨva ingangarim damuan markɨ. Egh ia gumazamizibar akurvaghsɨ bar ifongegh.
